terms: Terms of Service :CounterAttack App does not publish or sell user data entered into the application to any other party. The application of CounterAttack is bound to preserve the privacy of all users and their data.Property rights :It is not lawful to use the name of CounterAttack in any application or form including the logo or images in the application. “CounterAttack” is a trademark registered in the United States and is subject to copyright.Usage restrictions The application of CounterAttack meant to be used by amateur football players. All topics, images and discussions in the application must be focused on these topics. The application may not be used for profanity, obscene, defamatory, insulting, or promoting hate and racial discrimination. championship_sponsors: We are excited to introduce our sponsors for the championship! These companies have generously provided support for our event, and we encourage you to check out their products and services. By doing so, you can also help us thank them for their contribution.
